title: Serves lagging?
body:
Hey,
Just wanted to know if servers are lagging?

Was just in a game and pretty much everyone was experiencing lag.  
(they couldn't move their characters but they could type) 

Is anyone else experiencing this? 

:)

replies.body: is the same as me, and it randomly appeared in game.
is the same as me, and it randomly appeared in game.
only 1 time a year ago but the towers did not shoot so ow team just 1v5 the towers pre 6 and only took damage from there lanners big fun I wish I got it on vid ;-;
